snippet.title: Wings - Amiga - Cinemaware - More Gameplay from a classic!
snippet.description:
Wings from Cinemaware. A true classic.

Here is a sample of the gameplay from this WWI aviation classic. Capturing the feel of a movie dedicated to the WWI flying aces.

Please help support Cinemaware bring this classic back as a HD Director's Cut. Head to the Kickstarter page -

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/850516062/wings-directors-cut/

-----

This was recorded using the Mac Amiga Emulator FS-UAE and Quicktime's screen capture ability.

It's not 100% perfectly emulated but it's damn close. The real game had a slightly better frame rate in the dogfighting scenes and there was of course non of the tiny sound crackles that can be heard a little in this video.

Forgive my terrible flying. Was forced to use the keyboard to play as I don't have a gamepad for my Mac and capturing the PC version was being difficult. I'm usually much better I swear! :)

Thanks and remember...

Heroes Live Forever!
